original_title: Kaptein Sabeltann og grusomme Gabriels Skatt
overview: Kaptein Sabeltann is back! And when the people of Kjuttaviga also find a parchment that says there is another treasure from the pirate Grusomme Gabriel in Kjuttaviga, things really become wild.
title: Kaptein Sabeltann og grusomme Gabriels Skatt
